attributes.action: Overturn the Ban on the Video Game Manhunt 2
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is ridiculous how this harmless video game has been banned. I will call it 'harmless' because contrary to popular belief there is no proven link between violence and games, it is a myth. It is just entertainment. Just because some people moan about it does not mean it should be banned.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
